results.description: قال وزير الخارجية الأمريكي ماركو روبيو، الخميس، إن حاليا هو "الوقت الحاسم" للولايات المتحدة للتوصل إلى اتفاق نووي مع إيران بالنظر إلى مستويات تخصيب اليورانيوم لديها.

results.title: Enhancing Care with VARON: Free Gift for Amazon Buyers Who Register On Official Website
results.description: NEW YORK, May 16, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- VARON, a trusted name in respiratory care and oxygen solutions, has launched a new customer integration initiative aimed at enhancing service and long-term support for users who purchased VARON products on Amazon. Customers are now invited to register or subscribe on the official VARON website to receive a free accessory or small healthcare device valued up to $30 as a thank-you gift. As part of this program, users can choose from a selection of high-quality accessories or compact healthcare tools—such as fingertip oximeters or personal-use nebulizers—free of charge. The offer is designed not only to express appreciation for Amazon customers but also to strengthen the connection between users and VARON's dedicated support ecosystem. "We value every customer who has placed their trust in VARON through Amazon," said VARON CEO. "By bringing them into our official service network, we can deliver better technical support, direct access to parts and accessories, and a more personalized experience moving forward." A Unified Experience Across Platforms While VARON's Amazon storefront continues to serve a broad range of customers, the company's official website offers extended services not available through third-party platforms—most notably, access to replacement parts, oxygen concentrator accessories, service scheduling, and customer account management. Until now, customers who purchased VARON oxygen concentrators on Amazon had limited pathways to obtain compatible parts or request product-specific guidance. The new program bridges that gap, ensuring that all VARON users—regardless of purchase platform—receive consistent, high-quality service. Customers who register their Amazon purchases on Varon website will also benefit from faster warranty claims, priority repair assistance, software updates for supported devices, and promotional offers. Building Long-Term Relationships Through Better Support The announcement is part of VARON's broader strategy to enhance post-purchase care and promote long-term customer engagement. With many users requiring continued support and accessories—especially for home oxygen therapy—VARON is committed to making it easier for all customers to stay connected with the brand beyond the point of sale. "Customer retention isn't just about convenience—it's about continuity of care," added VARON CEO. "When customers have access to compatible parts, reliable accessories, and timely support, their devices last longer, and their treatment outcomes improve. That's what this program is about." How to Claim Your Free Gift To claim your free gift, simply contact our customer service at support@varoninc.com and provide your Amazon order number. Once verified, you'll be able to choose the free gift you'd like to receive. About VARONVARON is a global provider of advanced oxygen concentrators and respiratory care solutions, serving hospitals, clinics, and home users worldwide. With a mission to deliver safe, sustainable, and user-friendly respiratory technologies, VARON integrates healthcare-grade performance with customer-centric support. The company is committed to innovation, reliability, and environmental responsibility in all aspects of its business. Media Contact: VARON Oxygen Solutions Email: official@varoninc.com Phone: Website: www.varoninc.com

results.title: US 'troubled' by Gaza aid crisis, open to alternative plans, says Rubio
creator: FRANCE 24
© Umit Bektas, AFP
results.description: After a joint US-Israel plan to deliver aid into Gaza drew heavy criticism, US Secretary of State Marco Rubio on Thursday invited alternative suggestions while emphasizing the US' concern for the besieged enclave amid warnings of widespread famine in Gaza and Israel's intent to further ramp up its offensive in the territory.

results.title: Discover groundbreaking lifestyle innovations in fitness, wellness and more at 9th Consumer Electronics Exhibition
results.description: AIBI and Lovense to debut the latest in fitness and wellness technology SINGAPORE, May 16, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Leading fitness equipment and pleasure technology brands AIBI and Lovense will join over 300 brands to showcase the latest in lifestyle technology at the 9th Edition of Consumer Electronics Exhibition (CEE). Organised by Constellar, CEE 2025 will be held from 22 – 25 May at Suntec Convention & Exhibition Centre. Together with Challenger (Preferred Partner), GRAB (Official BNPL Partner), CIMB (Official Bank Partner), and Searix (Event Technology Partner), CEE 2025 highlights the rise of Lifestyle Tech, spotlighting innovations across three key verticals: Beauty Tech, Health & Wellness Tech, and Pleasure Tech. New Brands and New Product Launches As the Official Health Tech Partner and first-time exhibitor, AIBI will showcase a comprehensive line-up of innovative health and beauty electronic equipment designed for modern lifestyles. Visitors can try out the AIBI Vita Chair and the newly launched AIBI VibroZen Meditation Platform, which harness Vertical Vibration (WBV) and Horizontal Vibration (WBPA) technologies to support muscle toning, circulation, and stress relief. Other cutting-edge offerings include: SIXPAD, a Japanese EMS-based device that firms abdominal muscles in just 23 minutes; and Lumidiet, a Korean fat-burning innovation that uses LED and near-infrared light. Following the successful launch of its latest AI-powered innovations at the 2025 Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in Las Vegas, Lovense, a global leader in connected pleasure technology, will make its Singapore debut at CEE 2025 to showcase these app-connected innovations, which include the AI-powered Solace Pro, next-generation Lush 4, and Mission 2 which uses advanced Touch-Sense technology. Empowering individuals and couples to stay intimately connected across any distance, while fostering personal self-discovery and intimate wellness, visitors can experience how these devices act as interactive controllers that redefine personal connection at Lovense's Interactive Connection Zone. Visitors can 'test-drive' products using iPads or iPhones, engage with a responsive mobile app game, and witness the real-time synchronisation of the Mission 2 and Solace Pro via shared sensor technology. Singapore's only homegrown consumer electronics chain, Challenger, returns with extensive product showcases spanning PCs & electronics, accessories, audio devices, home & living as well as wearable tech. These include wellness gadgets such as the Samsung Galaxy Ring (tracks heart rate, sleep, skin temperature with AI insights), Yoose's compact waterproof USB-C shaver, and Soocas' 2-in-1 sonic toothbrush with built-in water flosser. Tech enthusiasts and gamers can also check out the ASUS NUC, MSI GeForce RTX 50 Series, try their hands at the Logitech racing wheel showcase, trade-up their Apple iPhone for special discounts, and participate in the Challenger Lucky Draw with every $300 spent. Exciting new product launches at CEE 2025 include Atrix's ultra-lightweight HP EliteBook 635 Aero Gen 11 AI Laptop at $1,299 (U.P. $1,889) and bundled with free HP accessories; OSIM's uErgoh, the world's first ergonomic chair with built-in massage that combines advanced massage technologies with adjustable ergonomic support; and the compact, budget-friendly Formovie Xming V1 Ultra projector by homeentertainment.sg with Google TV, Netflix and true 4K resolution. Returning exhibitor Hisense will launch the new Hisense U8Q, which features a Dolby Atmos audio system co-engineered with Devialet, delivering an all-in-one cinematic experience with no soundbar required. Other new exhibitors at CEE 2025 include BlindXpert with its SmartZip® Track Blinds to keep out rain and convert outdoor areas into functional spaces; and Narwal, which bagged several innovation awards at CES 2024 and 2025 for its advanced robotic cleaning solutions that include intelligent self-cleaning mops and vacuums. Returning Favourites Following its successful brand debut at the IT Show in March 2025, leading audio technology brand JBL returns with an expanded showcase featuring crowd favourites such as the Flip 6 Portable Bluetooth Speaker, Clip 5 Ultra-Portable Bluetooth Speaker, and the JBL PartyBox 110 Portable Party Speaker, among others. Visitors can also expect a bold line-up of new and stylish home appliances from Prism+, including a bespoke refrigerator range, the Neo air conditioner with energy-efficient performance in multiple colours, the pastel-finished Macaron ceiling fan, and next-gen display innovations. Celebrating its 28th anniversary this year, Singapore's third largest telco provider M1 returns with exclusive offers, discounts, early bird specials and daily lucky dips packed with attractive prizes. On top of enjoying $0 on latest phones from Apple, Samsung, OPPO, HONOR and affordable monthly plans from $48.95/month, visitors can participate in daily live auctions for new Apple phones and various products, starting as low as $28. Popular smart home electronics brands including Bbyeol, Eazea, Hisense, Hydroflux, Livingcare, Luxus Digital, Möwe, Roborock, Ruhens, Sterra, and Yuhome will also be back. Joining them are custom PC builders and gaming tech powerhouses like Aftershock PC, Dreamcore, Razer, Secretlab, Sony, TTRacing, and more, who will be offering exclusive deals and live product demonstrations. CEE 2025 promises an unmatched smart lifestyle shopping experience for all – from wellness seekers and tech enthusiasts to gamers and homemakers. Download the CEE 2025 brochure here. CEE, organised by Constellar, is part of its leading consumer electronics and technology event series that also includes IT SHOW, COMEX and The Tech Show. Together, they form Singapore's largest and most experiential consumer lifestyle tech marketplaces, connecting consumers with top brands and innovators in a comprehensive showcase of latest technologies, trends, products and gadgets. In an evolving consumer tech retail landscape, these shows offer an immersive one-stop platform for consumers to experience first-hand cutting-edge consumer technology showcases, new launches and exclusive deals that elevate modern living. Visit CEE 2025 from 22 – 25 May (Thursday to Sunday) at Suntec Convention and Exhibition Centre Level 3 (11AM to 9PM) and Level 4 (12PM to 9PM). For the latest information on new launches, deals and updates, join the mailing list, visit the website and follow CEE on Facebook, Instagram and TikTok. About Constellar: Constellar is Asia's preferred partner for convening businesses, curating ideas and creating opportunities for sustainable business growth and global impact. Based in Singapore with a regional footprint in China and Malaysia, we curate and develop influential trade and consumer events for key industries, connecting global marketplaces in sectors such as fintech, industrial transformation and ESG. We also manage the Singapore EXPO, Singapore's largest purpose-built venue for Meetings, Incentives, Conventions and Exhibitions (MICE). Our vision is to be a global leader made in Asia, activating impactful networks to enable cross-industry collaboration and innovation through our holistic portfolio of intellectual properties in the MICE industry. Visit constellar.co for more information. ANNEX: CEE 2025 Exclusive Deals & Promotions AIBI Starbuys: AIBI will be offering exclusive deals of up to 60 percent off on its EMS Foot Massager, SIXPAD Body Fit training gear, Eye Relax massager, Joint Relax massager and its latest product, the Vibro Zen vertical vibration platform machine. Check out details at its booth (8105). Homeowners can now book a guided Smart Living Experience session with Möwe to revitalise their living spaces and enjoy an exclusive PWP from as low as $1 with $100 spend. Available PWPs include smart bulbs, cameras, sockets, kettles, fans, as well as Wi-Fi motion and door sensors. Sign up here. Up to $200,000 worth of prizes at the Lucky Catch . Prizes up for grabs include an OSIM uDiva 2-seater Sofa, the latest Narwal robot cleaner Freo Z10, 65" TVs from Hisense and Prism+, Petgugu's Automatic Smart Cat Flush Toilet and more. Simply complete a survey onsite to participate. WOW Deals . Early birds can collect WOW Deals coupons at the Redemption counter and enjoy special discounts up to 80% off at the respective participating booths. Participating products include the MSI Pro MP251 E2 Monitor, Steed MKB110DB Wireless Office Combo, Tessan Socket Tower 12 Ways Outlet Extension Plug and VCE VE-PD15 10,000mAh Power Bank. Spend And Redeem . Shoppers who spend $500 or more across three combined receipts on the same day can redeem a $10 Challenger voucher, valid for use at the Challenger Zone on Level 3.

results.title: أبوقير للأسمدة يستضيف منتخب السويس في صراع القمة والقاع
results.description: يستضيف أبوقير للأسمدة بقيادة محمد عطية، نظيره منتخب السويس بقيادة ميمي فريد، في الخامسة من مساء اليوم، الجمعة، ضمن لقاءات الجولة الـ 36 بدوري المحترفين. ويدخل الفريقان اللقاء، ولا بديل عن الفوز، حيث يسعى أبوقير للأسمدة، للفوز للتواجد ضمن المراكز المؤهلة إلى الدوري الممتاز، حيث يحتل...

results.title: «يتفوق عليه».. ميدو: «لامين يامال هو شيكابالا في صغره»
results.description: يرى أحمد حسام «ميدو»، نجم نادي الزمالك السابق، الإسباني لامين يامال، جناح فريق بشرلونة الإسباني، يشبه محمود عبدالرازق «شيكابالا»، قائد نادي الزمالك في طريقة اللعب. وقال ميدو، خلال حواره ببودكاست «ابن كارك»: «شيكابالا قريب مني جدًا، أنا مربيه ومتبنيه وهو صغير وهو عنده 10 سنين كنت شايف أنه...

results.title: "الاكتئاب المبتسم كان سبباً في انتحار ابنتي"، فهل يعاني أبناؤنا بصمت؟
results.description: في الثامن عشر من سبتمبر/ أيلول عام 2024، أنهت الطالبة شهد، البالغة من العمر 17 عاماً، حياتها داخل دورة المياه في مدرستها في سلطنة عُمان. وتروي والدتها، السيدة عذراء، لبي بي سي تفاصيل الحادثة المؤلمة.
